text: Ia mangɨ, Godɨn Akɨnafarir osizirim da fofozim inigh. Kɨ ia ofa gamir arazibagh ifongezir puvatɨ. Nan ifongiamra kara, ia arazir aghuibar gumazir igharazibar amu.” Egha Iesus ua me mɨgɨa ghaze, “Kɨ Godɨn damazimɨn derazir gumaziba bagha izezir puvatɨ. Kɨ gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amibar dɨmasa ize!”
